short_summary: Financial audit services for House of Commons
description: House of Commons Request for proposal - Financial audit services
full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
==============================

**Financial Audit Services**
-----------------------------

### Tender Reference

* **Reference Number**: CB-9223-86682939
* **Solicitation Number**: 2023014

### Description

House of Commons is seeking a financial audit services provider. The contract will begin on 1st December 2023, and is expected to end on 30th September 2026.

### Requirements
-----------------------------

* **Audits Services**: The successful provider must offer audit services for the House of Commons.
* **Location**: The contract will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, ON.
* **Contracting Entity**: Chambre des communes (CdC), 50 O'Connor Street, 15th floor, Ottawa, ON, K1P 6L2, Canada.

### Evaluation Criteria
---------------------------

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Solicitation Process
------------------------

This is an open tendering process, where all eligible providers can submit a proposal. The tender notice and solicitation documents are available on MERX.

### Contact Information
-------------------------

* **Procurement Advisor**: Chris Murray
* **E-mail**: <contractingserv@parl.gc.ca>
* **Phone**: (613) 996-2214

Note: Please contact the procurement advisor directly for any inquiries or clarifications. A confirmation will be sent directly to the buying department. Please refer to the attached Terms and Conditions for more information.

### Notice Details
-------------------

* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-10
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-10-10

---

The following is the extracted data used to create the rewritten entry:

*   Publication Date
*   Tender Closing Date (also published and updated when amendment was added)
*   Amendment Date
*   Tender Reference Details (Reference Number, Solicitation Number)
*   Notice details (Tender Status)
*   Contract details (Regions Of Opportunity, Regions Of Delivery, Contracting Entity etc)
*   Evaluation criteria (Weighting would be stated, if required)
*   RFP/RFQ details (Where and how the tender process happened and where to see it)
*   Contact Information (who and where to contact)
*   Tender description
*   Amendment details (What changed in the amendment)
*   Parties engaged in the announcement valuably answered in extracted data
